xwikidoc.name: GlobalClassTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
## GLOBAL CLASS TRANSLATIONS ##I am pulling out many of the keys that are class based from individual translation files, such as Groups and Forms, and pulling them into this translation file. This is being done to avoid duplicate lookup strings across translation files. ## To view the different classes, go here. http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/CurrikiSpaceClass?editor=class ## I am also adding to this trans file elements that are used globally but not in class. Media Type roll over text for example. ##FROM GWT or XWIKI CORE \\
loading.loading_msg=Chargement, veuillez patienter problemoccured=Un problème est survenu lors du traitement de votre requête. Envoyez un mail au webmaster si ceci se produit encore.
\\ \\
##ASSET CLASS USED IN RESOURCES ## CATEGORIES / MEDIA TYPES PLUS COLLECTIONS AND FOLDERS \\

##CATEGORY AND / OR FILE TYPE ##Although the below are not taken from the Assets, that is, these most of these values are NOT stored in the classes, I am adding them to this file because they are global. Todd December 31, 2008. \\
